pr_title: Move the Security API to Mutiny

timeline.message: Move the Security API to Mutiny
Move the Security API to Mutiny
Move the Security API to Mutiny

timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText:
Any reason to change the output?
Initially, you was redeeming null, now you create null from an Optional.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText:
Depends on the laziness you want, you can delay the result creation with a supplier (() -> {...}).
It would only create the object on subscription.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: I believe you want to emit null right?
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: You can, if you want, delay the creation of the challenge at subscription time.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: Wondering if this ChallengeData can be cached and singleton.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: Wondering if this ChallengeData can be cached and singleton.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: Are you trying to emit null?
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: Is it something that could be migrated to Uni?
timeline.author: cescoffier
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -56,13 +59,13 @@ private static QuarkusSecurityIdentity augmentIdentity(SecurityIdentity security
                 .addPermissionChecker(new Function<Permission, CompletionStage<Boolean>>() {

replies.bodyText: That would avoid the eager subscription.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: @cescoffier the expectation here has been that Vertx client will not block itself if establishing a connection to OIDC is required. Can it block ? CC @pmlopes
replies.author: sberyozkin

replies.bodyText: this code waits for an item, even if the underlying communication and processing in non-blocking, this code is waiting for the result.
replies.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: you can use flatMap as a shortcut.
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText: you can use flatMap as a shortcut
timeline.author: cescoffier

timeline.bodyText:
Not totally sure what you are doing here.
The subscription will trigger the computation.
But you may want to be sure that an error has not been emitted.
timeline.author: cescoffier
